metadata.title: CVE-2017-16544 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In the add_match function in libbb/lineedit.c in BusyBox through 1.27.2, the tab autocomplete feature of the shell, used to get a list of filenames in a directory, does not sanitize filenames and results in executing any escape sequence in the terminal. This could potentially result in code execution, arbitrary file writes, or other attacks.

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4').
